channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear

item.title: CVE-2014-9989|2024-09-16T16:38:58.748Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9615, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, and SD 450, if an incorrect endpoint number or direction is passed, an out of bounds array access may occur in the USB management module.

item.title: CVE-2015-9204|2024-09-16T17:49:23.288Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 808, and SD 810, if cchFriendlyName is greater than TZ_PR_MAX_NAME_LEN in function playready_leavedomain_generate_challenge(), a buffer overread occurs.

item.title: CVE-2015-9209|2024-09-16T16:42:36.356Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9615, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, and SDX20, there is improper access control in a file storage API.

item.title: CVE-2015-9207|2024-09-16T17:53:53.817Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, and SD 810, lack of input validation in playready_getadditional_responsedata could lead to a buffer overread.

item.title: CVE-2016-10415|2024-09-16T17:54:25.751Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9640, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 835, and SDX20, dereference of an invalid input parameter could cause a denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2015-9190|2024-09-16T16:23:26.368Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9615, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 808, and SD 810, if start_addr + size is too large in boot_clobber_check_local_address_range(), an integer overflow occurs, resulting in clobber protection check being bypassed and SBL memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2017-8274|2024-09-16T16:43:29.996Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before security patch level 2018-04-05 on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, an access control vulnerability exists in Core.

item.title: CVE-2017-18138|2024-09-16T16:28:40.214Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before security patch level 2018-04-05 on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, in GERAN, a buffer overflow may potentially occur.

item.title: CVE-2015-9143|2024-09-16T17:54:23.519Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9615, MDM9625, MDM9640, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 600, SD 615/16/SD 415, and SDX20, when reading CDT from eMMC with a very large meta offset (>size of default CDT-array compiled in bootloader) for one of the CDBs, a buffer overflow occurs.

item.title: CVE-2015-9139|2024-09-16T16:28:28.092Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9615, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, and SD 820, improper input validation can occur while negotiating an SSL handshake.

item.title: CVE-2017-18145|2024-09-16T16:53:56.284Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before security patch level 2018-04-05 on Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile and Snapdragon Wear MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, SD 835, SD 845, while the DPM native process is processing framework events, the iterator pointer is deleted after processing an event. When processing subsequent events, a Use After Condition will occur.
